title: Remote debugging over TeamViewer
author: Jamie

breadcrumb.name: How to solve problems with engineers

content:
When you encounter some difficult problems while using LetsVPN Windows, our engineer will provide remote support via TeamViewer to help you.

Due to the complexity of Windows operating system, you might encounter some difficult problems that can‚Äôt be solved by yourself. Thereby, our technical engineer will provide remote support via TeamViewer to help you solve the problems. Please simply follow the instructions.

1.Download TeamViewer

Go to TeamViewer.com, click "Download for Free".

2.Install TeamViewer

Open the download installer and click Basic installation.

Please select Personal/Non-commercial use.

3.Get Your ID and Password

Your ID and Password of your computer will appear in the red box when you open TeamViewer. These are required when our technical engineer remotely control your computer.

4.Click Finish and Close TeamViewer

Please close TeamViewer after debugging finishes.

Note: Your TeamViewer ID is fixed. However, the password changes every time when you open TeamViewer. Please be assured that your personal information is secure.

Related article:

  • <How to download Microsoft Network Monitor>

Microsoft Network Monitor will efficiently help technical engineer locate your problem. For more details, please read the article.
